attributes.action: take some responsibility for the negative effects of the 2012 Olympics logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The chosen logo is a shambolic, garish, meaningless, failure to encompass what it means for us to host the Olympics or to include the content of the Olympics itself.

The logo represents not only a sporting event, but also the citizens, city and nation hosting it.

Although the design process was not directly controlled by the government, the resulting logo is a representation of the entire nation, so is directly linked.

The government should think carefully about how this ridiculous (and grotesquely expensive) logo could effect its country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
